attributes.additional_details:
Hospital car park charges are not only a tax on the sick and their visitors; they are also discriminatory against the English.

If the Scots and Welsh are allowed free hospital car parking, it is unfair discrimination against the English that they should have to pay when visiting hospitals either when they are keeping hospital appointments or visiting family or friends who are patients.

I call on the Government to give equal status to the English and stop penalising the sick by making all car parking at hospitals free of charge.
